data.title: "She is a work in progress but I am proud of her achievements so far" Kunle Afolayan takes pride in daughter, Eyitemi
data.meta_description: Nollywood actor and filmmaker, Kunle Afolayan is no doubt a proud father as he has taken pride in his daughter, Eyitemi. Taking to his Instagram page, he
data.text:
Nollywood actor and filmmaker, Kunle Afolayan is no doubt a proud father as he has taken pride in his daughter, Eyitemi.

Taking to his Instagram page, he took pride in his first daughter, whom he called Princess Omowunmi from her script name in his new movie, Anikulapo Series The Rise of Spectre. He noted how though she is still a work in progress, however, he is proud of her achievements so far.

“My daughter Eyitemi aka Princess Omowunmi is a work in progress but I am proud of her achievements so far”.

Taking to his comment section, Eyitemi appreciated her father of her upbringing. She wrote, “Thank you for the upbringing Baba mi”.

See some reactions below,

Toyosi Adesanya wrote, “Thank you for the fatherly role

Actress Lydia Forson wrote, “Wow! I still remember meeting her as a little girl, she’s grown up so beautifully

Jumoke Odetola wrote, “Star

Aisha Lawal wrote, “Yemyem my baby

One Beeholar wrote, “Lion no dey born goat

One Ronkky Bebe wrote, “My darling Eyi yem. Greater heights darling

One Debukkie wrote, “She looks so much like Aunty Moji Afolayan. The hair, the brows, the resemblance is too much”.

Last month, Kunle caused drama on the internet with his ‘inappropriate’ dance moves with his daughter, Eyiyemi, at the premiere of his long-awaited series, Anikulapo; The Rise of the Spectre.

Videos from the after party of the premiere captured when Kunle Afolayan was dancing with his first daughter, who is one of the major cast in the Anikulapo series.

The dance step which is a common one among lovers grabbed the eye of netizens who lectured him for doing such with his blood. See the video here.

Reacting to it, Kunle Afolayan shared a video of him listening to Phyno’s song, ‘Do I’, indirectly meaning that he doesn’t care about the backlash.

He declared that he was a King and the child of the most High, so his critics can only try. In all, love surpasses everything.

His daughter, Eyiyemi Afolayan who was unbothered, re-echoed his words.

Kemi Filani reported last year that Kunle Afolayan had explained why he cast his daughter, Eyiyemi Afolayan, for the role of Princess Omowunmi in his release, Anikulapo.

Kunle Afolayan, who posted a short video clip of his daughter and himself on his verified Instagram handle, said the role required somebody beautiful and his daughter is definitely beautiful. He added that the youngster is also a good singer as well as a natural at acting.

Eyiyemi is Kunle Afolayan’s first child and she made her debut appearance as an actor on the set of Anikulapo.
